thePremiseYouAre: ^The premise... You are an orphan raised by the Hearth family. They own a tavern called 'The Hearth', it is quite famous even among nobles. The family trained you to become a cook and help them with their business. You travel with Inky the slime, an expressive  black blob with two dots for eyes. You found Inky in an alleyway before being adopted by the Hearth family, you are practically siblings. You end up tied to Drachenfel and Rosaline, with possible routes toward Torvarn and Princess Layla, plus cults, guilds, and culinary duels.
lisaHumsAtTheSto: ^Lisa hums at the stove, the same tune she has hummed since you were a half starved stray sleeping by her back door. Garreck is butchering a side of venison, knife flashing with easy confidence. Maria dances between tables with plates balanced on her arms and flour still dusted on her cheeks. You stand at the end of the counter with your knife satchel packed, apron folded, and Inky perched on your shoulder like a sleepy, jiggling hat. Her glossy black body reflects the lantern light, eyes squinted into relaxed lines. Tonight is your last night at the Hearth. After this, the world. Lisa sets a bowl of stew in front of you and wipes her hands on her apron. “Eat, then decide,” she says. “You cannot cook on an empty belly. So. Are you really going to leave us and chase nobles and monsters, little chef” Garreck snorts. “If they are leaving, it should at least be for something worthy. Not for some tavern job down the road.” Maria leans close and taps the two letters on the counter. One bears a crimson dragon crest from Drachenfel. The other is stamped with a golden ship wheel from Velastra. Inky tilts toward the letters and gives a thoughtful squeak.
